name: 許嘉裕
objective:
This course aims to explain the fundamental of machine learning, including the concept and algorithms, and applications in industry. The main contents include:
1. Fundamental of Machine Learning
2. Learning Theory 
3. Machine Learning Algorithms
4. Neural network and Backpropagation
5. Deep learning models
6. Term project and hands-on labs
